conbody.p:
The DITA Open Toolkit supports the following image formats:
JPG
Joint Photographic Experts Group
PNG
Portable Network Graphics
GIF
Graphics Interchange Format
BMP
Bitmap
TIFF
Tagged Image File Format
EPS
Encapsulated PostScript
SVG
Scalable Vector Graphics
It is convenient to insert images by means of the Insert Graphic DITA custom content.
The placement attribute of an image specifies whether an image should be displayed inline (the value is inline) or separated from the surrounding text (the value is break).
By default, an image gets inserted as inline, but you can always change the value of the attribute.
